user_query: I want to surprise my partner with a romantic getaway. Please search for romantic hotels in Paris and provide me with the hotel details. Additionally, suggest some romantic activities or places we can visit in Paris.

TaskList.description: Search for romantic hotels in Paris and gather their details such as name, location, and amenities.
Provide the gathered hotel details to the user.
Suggest romantic activities or places to visit in Paris based on popular recommendations.
Compile the hotel details and suggested activities into a complete plan for the romantic getaway.
